item.title: Cross Domain Iframe Form Submission Tracking Google Analytics
item.description: #Custom CMO Dashboards: Automating The Bing Ads API With¬†JAMstack Providing a holistic executive CMO Dashboard is a common goal among digital marketing agencies. Giving clients “all digital at a glance” is a huge win because it returns objective business value immediately in the form of agile decision making. The “single source of the truth” mantra means stakeholders have actionable high-fidelity insight into disparate digital ad platforms trends. A surprising number of agencies have trouble delivering just such a dashboard.
